com.adidas.ui.util

Class DateUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adidas.ui.util.DateUtil

  • public class DateUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Class created to help with the date format. It is the unique access point to get the date format

        public static java.lang.String getDateFormat(android.content.Context context)
        Method that returns the date format pattern
        Parameters:
        context - The android context
        Returns:
        The string date format pattern ready to be used to format any string

      • setDateFormat

        public static void setDateFormat(java.lang.String dateFormat)
        Method used for testing purpose. It injects a date format to the class to avoid android calls
        Parameters:
        dateFormat - String with the date format
